name: Boucle Curved Sofa
description: A luxe take on mid-century design, the Bouclé Curved Sofa features a soft curved silhouette. A modern yet elegant addition to a living room, the sofa is fully upholstered in our off-white textured bouclé. The Bouclé Curved Sofa is designed for comfort and durability. Featuring a wooden frame, softened with the highest quality foam padding, finished with soft textured bouclé fabric.
